resources.string: You should spend about 20 minutes on these questions, which are based on the reading passage below
Choose TRUE if the statement agrees with the information given in the text, choose FALSE if the statement contradicts the information, or choose NOT GIVEN if there is no information on this.
Choose the correct letter, A, B, C or D.
You should spend about 20 minutes on these questions
Listen and decide whether the statements are True(T), False(F) or Not Given(N)
Press the play button to listen to the question and then record your answer
